quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.quote: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to Carpet.
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code.
quotes.author: Dan Salomon

quotes.quote: Perl – The only language that looks the same before and after RSA encryption.
quotes.author: Keith Bostic

quotes.quote: If builders built buildings the way programmers wrote programs, then the first woodpecker that came along would destroy civilization.
quotes.author: Gerald Weinberg

quotes.quote: It's not a bug – it's an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
quotes.author: Edward V. Berard

quotes.quote: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it’s too late.
quotes.author: Seymour Cray

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of programming languages: those people always bitch about and those nobody uses.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
quotes.author: Grady Booch

quotes.quote: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.
quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond

quotes.quote: To iterate is human, to recurse divine.
quotes.author: L. Peter Deutsch

quotes.quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.quote: A language that doesn’t affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: The best performance improvement is the transition from the nonworking state to the working state.
quotes.author: John Ousterhout

quotes.quote: Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.
quotes.author: Mosher’s Law of Software Engineering

quotes.quote: As soon as we started programming, we found to our surprise that it wasn’t as easy to get programs right as we had thought. Debugging had to be discovered. I can remember the exact instant when I realized that a large part of my life from then on was going to be spent in finding mistakes in my own programs.
quotes.author: Maurice Wilkes

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.
quotes.author: Rick Cook

quotes.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.quote: Fix the cause, not the symptom.
quotes.author: Steve Maguire

quotes.quote: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming: feedback is the treatment.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: When to use iterative development? You should use iterative development only on projects that you want to succeed.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
quotes.author: Austin Freeman

quotes.quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
quotes.author: Ralph Johnson

quotes.quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
quotes.author: Kent Beck

quotes.quote: Programmers are not to be measured by their ingenuity and their logic but by the completeness of their case analysis.
quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis

quotes.quote: The best method for accelerating a computer is the one that boosts it by 9.8 m/s².
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: Sometimes it’s better to leave something alone, to pause, and that’s very true of programming.
quotes.author: Joyce Wheeler

quotes.quote: Testing can only prove the presence of bugs, not their absence.
quotes.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.quote: How rare it is that maintaining someone else’s code is better than rewriting it from scratch.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: It’s OK to figure out murder mysteries, but you shouldn’t need to figure out code. You should be able to read it.
quotes.author: Steve McConnell

quotes.quote: In software, the most beautiful code, the most beautiful functions, and the most beautiful programs are sometimes not there at all.
quotes.author: Jon Bentley

quotes.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Don’t comment bad code – rewrite it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs to an empty text file.
quotes.author: Louis Srygley

quotes.quote: The most important single aspect of software development is to be clear about what you are trying to build.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: While physics and mathematics may tell us how the universe began, they are not much use in predicting human behavior because there are far too many equations to solve. I’m no better than anyone else at understanding what makes people tick, particularly women.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
